hypothesis: (s-009) Xavier says: Alice, Violet, Yara, Tina, Quinn, and David all have the same role
(s-013) Hint: Among all players, there is exactly one spy

proof.full: Since there is exactly one spy and Xavier claims all 6 players have the same role, this is impossible (they can't all be knights, knaves, or spies). Therefore Xavier is lying, making him a knave.
